main event: A witness reported seeing a strange bright green and white light that fell near the roadside while driving home.
interesting points: The object appeared oval-shaped and made of metallic material.,The object had an intense glow approximately 20 feet in diameter and about 10 feet in height.,The witness and their son were in a state of shock while observing the phenomenon.,The object rose slowly before accelerating to a fantastic speed and disappearing.,The incident was reported to the USAF and forwarded to the American Meteor Society for further evaluation.
sighted object: an oval-shaped object with a metallic appearance emitting bright green and white light
